id: scenario-public-observer-community-organizer-scenarios-district-organizer tracks accountability for special education commitments
title: Organizer tracks accountability for special education commitments
description: Organizer tracks accountability for special education commitments
content:
Scenario: Organizer tracks accountability for special education commitments
    Given district promised improved special education services
    And the organizer's coalition of parents won the commitment
    When the Observer tracks implementation progress
    Then the organizer monitors hiring of promised support staff
    And sees resource allocation to special education programs
    And receives alerts when implementation lags behind timeline
    And documents wins to show parents their advocacy worked
    And district learns parent organizing demands follow-through
